Package com.judopay.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardNumberEntryView
    A view that allows for card number data to be input by the user and the detected card type to be displayed alongside the card number.
    CardSecurityCodeView  
    CardTypeImageView
    A view that displays a card type image (Visa, Amex, etc.) to provide the user with feedback that their card type has been recognised.
    CountrySpinner
    A view that shows a drop-down list of countries that can be selected when performing address verification checks (AVS) during card input.
    ExpiryDateEntryView
    A view that allows for a card expiry date to be entered or for a tokenized expiry number to be shown.
    FlipAnimation  
    FlipImageView  
    HidingViewTextWatcher
    A TextWatcher that hides the HidingViewTextWatcher.view when text has been entered.
    HintFocusListener  
    IssueNumberEntryView  
    JudoTextInputLayout  
    NumberFormatTextWatcher  
    PostcodeEntryView  
    ScrollOnFocusChangeListener  
    SecureServerTextView  
    SecurityCodeEntryView
    A view that allows for the security code of a card (CV2, CID) to be input and an image displayed to indicate where on the payment card the security code can be located.
    SimpleTextWatcher  
    SingleClickOnClickListener  
    StartDateEntryView  
    ThemedLinearLayout  
    ViewAlphaChangingTextWatcher
